Package it.polimi.ingsw.LM34.Exceptions.Controller

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CannotPlacePawnException
    Exception thrown in TowersContext when the player has already one pawn of the same color in the Tower, unless it is of the NEUTRAL PawnColor
    CardTypeNumLimitReachedException
    This exception is invoked whe the user has more cards than the limit specified in the Rules by CranioCreations
    InvalidLeaderCardAction
    This exception has the aim to be thrown if the user selects an action that is not registered in the enum LeaderCardsAction
    MarketBanException
    This exception is invoked inside the MarketContext (an AbstractGameContext) if the player has the MarketBan penalty and cannot place anymore his FamilyMember inside the Market
    NetworkConnectionException  
    NoMoreLeaderCardsAvailable  
    NoSuchContextException
    This exception is launched if the ContextFactory if there is an error in forging the AbstractGameContext of the game based on the ContextType
    NotAvailableSpace
    Exception thrown in Market or WorkingAreas if the number of players is not sufficient to access the advanced action slot of those game spaces
    NotEnoughMilitaryPoints
    Thi exception is invoked when the player wants to buy another TerritoryCard but does not have enough military points based on the corresponding track
    NotEnoughResourcesException
    Exception thrown in TowersContext when the player has not enough resources for buying the selected card
    NotEnoughServantsException
    Exception thrown when the player does not have enough servants to increase the FamilyMember value,
